div.div: The mission of Covington Independent School District is to graduate responsible young adults with the knowledge and skills to achieve their goals by providing a learning environment that instills values, sense of purpose and pride in our Covington owl heritage.

p.span: Covington Independent School District | 501 North Main St. | Covington, TX 76636 | Phone: 254-854-2215 | Fax: 254-854-2272

div.p: Equal Opportunity Policy: Covington ISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, sex, age, national origin, marital or veteran status, or handicap in admission or access to, or treatment or employment in, its programs and activities in compliance with applicable federal and state laws.
